comments.body: what happens on userFeatures failing or throwing?  Do we print a decent error message?
If it fails/throws we'll simply pass that exception up which I think is the right approach.

ok, I guess my point was does that print something useful and do we have a test for it?  its one thing for our internal code, once folks can start extending and doing potentially weird things I just want to make sure  we have decent message there.
So you'll get a stack trace because we don't wrap anything so the developer should see their customs step involved and know that it's up to them to debug it.
